text: Ani he loka mhanatata ki amhi tara kahi mojake divasa jahannamamadhye rahu, (tyanna) sanga ki, kaya tumhi sarvasrestha allahakaduna ekhade vacana ghetale ahe jara ghetale ahe tara khatrine sarvasrestha allaha apalya vacanaca bhanga karanara nahi kinva tumhi allahacya sambandhane asa gosti sangata jya tumhi janata nahi
